subject: Re: NEW BOOK ON EVP-BY A SCIENTIST

full_text:
You think EVP has not evolved because you ignore all evidence and the results of all researchers/enthusiasts. It is all to easy for people to deny deny deny, do no experiments themselves, and claim they somehow know better.

 Bottom line, EVP is mostly for the one receiving it, few if any will hear the same thing, we get enough to show there something real hear. 

 Ya wanna make us all believe it's some kind of skitzo shit, ya might want to move on to someone who might listen. 

F-S
